verses.text: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* is not \w shortened|strong="H7114"\w*, that it cannot \w save|strong="H3467"\w*; neither his \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w*, that it cannot \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*:

But your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* have \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* you and your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and your \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* have \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \add his\add* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from you, that he will not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*.\f + \fr 59.2 \ft have hid: or, have made him hide\f*

For your \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* are \w defiled|strong="H1351"\w* with \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and your \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w* with \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; your \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, your \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* hath \w muttered|strong="H1897"\w* \w perverseness|strong="H5766"\w*.

None \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* for \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, nor \add any\add* \w pleadeth|strong="H8199"\w* for \w truth|strong="H0530"\w*: they \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in \w vanity|strong="H8414"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H7723"\w*; they \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w*, and bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.

They \w hatch|strong="H1234"\w* \w cockatrice’|strong="H6848"\w* \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w*, and \w weave|strong="H0707"\w* the \w spider’s|strong="H5908"\w* \w web|strong="H6980"\w*: he that \w eateth|strong="H0398"\w* of their \w eggs|strong="H1000"\w* \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w*, and that which is \w crushed|strong="H2116"\w* breaketh \w out|strong="H1234"\w* into a \w viper|strong="H0660"\w*.\f + \fr 59.5 \ft cockatrice’: or, adder’s\f*\f + \fr 59.5 \ft crushed…: or, sprinkled is as if there brake out a viper\f*

Their \w webs|strong="H6980"\w* shall not become \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, neither shall they \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* themselves with their \w works|strong="H4639"\w*: their \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \add are\add* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, and the \w act|strong="H6467"\w* of \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \add is\add* in their \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*.

Their \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* to \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and they make \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* to \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: their \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \add are\add* \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*; \w wasting|strong="H7701"\w* and \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* \add are\add* in their \w paths|strong="H4546"\w*.\f + \fr 59.7 \ft destruction: Heb. breaking\f*

The \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* they \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not; and \add there is\add* no \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* in their \w goings|strong="H4570"\w*: they have made them \w crooked|strong="H6140"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*: whosoever \w goeth|strong="H1869"\w* therein shall not \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.\f + \fr 59.8 \ft judgment: or, right\f*

¶ Therefore is \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from us, neither doth \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* us: we \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* for \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, but behold \w obscurity|strong="H2822"\w*; for \w brightness|strong="H5054"\w*, \add but\add* we \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w*.

We \w grope|strong="H1659"\w* for the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* like the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, and we \w grope|strong="H1659"\w* as if \add we had\add* no \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: we \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* at \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w* as in the \w night|strong="H5399"\w*; \add we are\add* in \w desolate|strong="H0820"\w* places as \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \add men\add*.

We \w roar|strong="H1993"\w* all like \w bears|strong="H1677"\w*, and \w mourn|strong="H1897"\w* \w sore|strong="H1897"\w* like \w doves|strong="H3123"\w*: we \w look|strong="H6960"\w* for \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, but \add there is\add* none; for \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \add but\add* it is far \w off|strong="H7368"\w* from us.

For our \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* are \w multiplied|strong="H7231"\w* before thee, and our \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* against us: for our \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w* \add are\add* with us; and \add as for\add* our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, we \w know|strong="H3045"\w* them;

In \w transgressing|strong="H6586"\w* and \w lying|strong="H3584"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and departing \w away|strong="H5253"\w* \w from|strong="H0310"\w* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* and \w revolt|strong="H5627"\w*, \w conceiving|strong="H2029"\w* and \w uttering|strong="H1897"\w* from the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.

And \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* is turned \w away|strong="H5253"\w* \w backward|strong="H0268"\w*, and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5975"\w* afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*: for \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H3782"\w* in the \w street|strong="H7339"\w*, and \w equity|strong="H5229"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w*.

Yea, \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w faileth|strong="H5737"\w*; and he \add that\add* \w departeth|strong="H5493"\w* from \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* maketh himself a \w prey|strong="H7997"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, and it \w displeased|strong="H3415"\w* him that \add there was\add* no \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 59.15 \ft maketh…: or, is accounted mad\f*\f + \fr 59.15 \ft it displeased…: Heb. it was evil in his eyes\f*

¶ And he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \add there was\add* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w wondered|strong="H8074"\w* that \add there was\add* no \w intercessor|strong="H6293"\w*: therefore his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* brought \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w* unto him; and his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, it \w sustained|strong="H5564"\w* him.

For he put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* as a \w breastplate|strong="H8302"\w*, and an \w helmet|strong="H3553"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and he put \w on|strong="H3847"\w* the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* of \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \add for\add* \w clothing|strong="H8516"\w*, and was \w clad|strong="H5844"\w* with \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* as a \w cloke|strong="H4598"\w*.

According \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \add their\add* \w deeds|strong="H1578"\w*, accordingly he will \w repay|strong="H7999"\w*, \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to his \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w*, \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w* to his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; to the \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* he will \w repay|strong="H7999"\w* \w recompence|strong="H1576"\w*.\f + \fr 59.18 \ft deeds: Heb. recompences\f*

So shall they \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, and his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* from the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*. When the \w enemy|strong="H6862"\w* shall come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* like a \w flood|strong="H5104"\w*, the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall lift up a \w standard|strong="H5127"\w* against him.  +  r 59.19  t lift…: or, put him to flight *

¶ And the \w Redeemer|strong="H1350"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and unto them that \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w* in \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

As for me, this \add is\add* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; My \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* that \add is\add* upon thee, and my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which I have \w put|strong="H7760"\w* in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, shall not \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* out of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, nor out of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, nor out of the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of thy \w seed’s|strong="H2233"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, from henceforth and \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.
